featured.text: According to the passage, why was tea NOT a common drink of everyday life in the seventeenth century?
A lover of tea since her childhood in Portugal, she brought tea-drinking to the English royal court and set a trend for the beverage in the seventeenth century.

definition.zh_def: 第十七的，表示順序中的第十七個。
definition.en_def: The ordinal number corresponding to the number 17 in a sequence.
definition.example: She finished in seventeenth place in the race.
